text:
Hello everyone! @emma added me to this group chat yesterday :slightly_smiling_face: thought I'd say hello and introduce myself! 

I'm Halima, I love Art & enjoy creating new things. I'm currently taking these subjects for my A-levels: Philosophy, Geography and English literature. 

Fun fact: I like animals :thinking_face::sweat_smile: & um I have two (random) black cats that come and sit in front of my door (in my front garden) everyday
:joy: Should I name them?
@halimahaq10 I think you should name them Emma & Dexter :stuck_out_tongue_winking_eye:

So we're all creative in one way or another ... Michael with his beard growing, Sahil with his non-ukelele playing, Halima with her art, Alexandra with her DJing, Sophie with her drawing (I've seen some of her stuff, it's awesome!), Janina works in marketing, I love painting! 

How about you @amysheikh05 & @kaurm-2011?

During the time when I'm not studying I often play Video games on my Playstation console :video_game: . My favourite one is 'Assassins Creed' (Going to buy the newly released sequel for it during the christmas holidays).
